entries.TITLE: About Morpheus TV
entries.CONTENT:
MorpheusTV is a free app that searches websites for streaming links.

All links are available to the public in their respective websites and are hosted by third-party services like Openload, Streamango, Google, TheVideo, Vidup, Vidoza, etc..

The app can automatically download subtitles for movies and tv shows which are provided by third-party websites like Opensubtitles, LegendasDivx and TVSubs.

The author does not host or upload any of the content of the app. 
All content is retrieved from third-party websites like Trakt.tv, TMDB, Imdb, SeriesOnline, 123MoviesHD, CartoonHD, Flixanity, Alluc, etc... 
The author does not have any affiliation with the content providers and is not responsible for the content they provide.
